name: Soaring Heart's Lavender Blue
description: Lavender is full sister to Pink Cashmere so another one of the Purple family. She earned a dry CH leg last year at the Oregon State fair and again in the Summer V show she took GCH and BIS so she has dry leg in both live and Virtual shows.

name: Soaring Heart's Petite Chateau
description: Petite is a lovely correct doe out of Soaring heart's Sienna Princess *P(now at Mini Love Farm where she earned her milk star that is not reflected on Petite's registration paperwork) and by  Soaring Heart's Mal Maison *B. She is dual registered with both TMGR and MDGA and will be on milk test in 2023 as a first freshener. The picture is from Petite as baby and will be updated soon with udder pics.
